page.title: 17PROMINENT WOLSTON PEOPLE
page.content: The school crossing warden has been {'Lollypop Lady'}for 26 years and in that time has had to have four different stop signs for helping children to cross the road. The village {police constable}comes into school to promote good relationships with the young and get them involved in a good neighbourhood scheme. The oldest person in Bennett Court is 92 years old and one resident has lived in the same house for 78 years. Many of the streets in Wolston are named after notable past residents. The{ Chairman of the{Parish Council}holds a prominent position in the community and with nine other members deal with local problems. The{two Wolston {doctors,}a man and wife team, have lived in the village for a considerable time and see patients in a purpose built health centre.
